cashierCanSubtitle: To change permissions, login on the web at commongood.earth
deviceAssociated: This device is now associated with {{company}}
logoutFailure: Logout was unsuccessful. Please try again.
scanQRCode: Scan must be a QR CODE
confirm_self_service_mode: Are you sure you want to enable self service mode?
toSetPreferences: To set your preferences, please press the menu button.
transactionLowFundsNote: The account you are trying to charge does not have enough Common Good to cover this transaction.
transactionUndoSuccessNote: Transaction has been reversed. You refunded Susan Shopper {{amount}} for goods and services.
verifyCustomer: This is {{name}}'s first purchase. Please ask to see a photo ID, and check that it matches the image and name displayed below.
disassociate_company: This will disassociate this device from {{company}}
haveToSignInAgain: You will have to sign in again
cashier_permission: Manager permission is required to perform this action
confirm_undo_transaction: Are you sure you want to undo this transaction?
exchange_selected_payment_advice: Tell customer: There is a {{feeValue}} {{paymentName}} fee.
login_your_self: You are already signed in as
can_not_use_real_card: You cannot use a real card with a demo company. To exit demo mode, choose "Sign Out" in the menu or "Forget Company" in preferences
can_not_use_demo_card: You cannot use a demo card with a real company.
not_valid_card: 'That is not a valid  CGPay Card.'
offline_old_transactions: Warning: There are offline transactions that are more than 24 hours old. Please connect your device to the internet.
must_be_customer: You must use your customer Account to do a transaction
must_not_be_yourself: You can't do business with yourself.
action_not_enabled: This feature is disabled. A manager can enable it online at commongood.earth.
went_wrong: There was an error in communication, please try again...
must_be_affiliated: You must be affiliated with the company you are logging in with to do a transaction
